title: A Venezia
brief_description: Covers cultural activities during the World Week for Venice, organised by UNESCO. Appearances by Peter Ustinov, Spanish flamenco dancers Jose and Ricardo, Ravi Shankar, Paul McCartney and Wings, Georges Moustaki and many other performers are interspersed with scenes of Venice.
